seo.description: Front-End Engineer @ XING, Developer, Designer and Martial Artist.

about.headline: About me
about.text: *Stefan Imhoff*, Front-End Engineer at [XING](https://www.xing.com/profile/Stefan_Imhoff). Designer, Developer and Martial Artist. Loves [Ninja & Ninjutsu](http://kogakure.de/), Bujinkan, [Calisthenics](https://flipboard.com/@kogakure/fitness-calisthenics-ceo3hg8by), [Movies](http://www.imdb.com/user/ur15936207/ratings), [Books](https://www.goodreads.com/review/list/28460819-stefan), [Architecture](https://flipboard.com/@kogakure/architecture-interior-gkccts4cy), [Art & Design](https://flipboard.com/@kogakure/art-design-5djq9118y), Typography, Philosophy, Japan, [Japanese Tattoos](https://flipboard.com/@kogakure/irezumi-japanese-tattoo-t3anr4uby), Thunderstorm & Rain, Sun, the Sea, Forests, Bamboo, [Time Lapse & Slow Motion](https://flipboard.com/@kogakure/time-lapse-slow-motion-e3hoo13ay), Kanji, Apple, Wabi Sabi, [Niedersächsiche Hochzeitssuppe](http://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hochzeitssuppe), [Haiku](/haiku/) and [Vim](https://gist.github.com/kogakure/33992).

books.headline: Bookworm
books.text:
I love [books](https://www.goodreads.com/review/list/28460819), to be precice I love *paper* books. I can not imagine a living room without shelves of books.

Most likly I inherited this passion from my grandfather, who owned over **4000** books. My books count roughly a  **1000**. I buy books ahead and my desks are always stuffed with unread books. I like classics, books about philosophy, martial arts, art & desgin, architecture, typography and novels.

Work-related books I read mostly digital, because they get old too fast and don’t look nice in most cases.

introvert.headline: Introvert
introvert.text: I am an introvert. Only ¼ of all people around the globe are introverted, that’s why we are usually outnumbered. Introverts think differently, their brain processes information in a different way than other brains. While extraverts get energy by social interaction with other people, introverts loose their energy and need time to refill.

quote.japanese: <ruby>能<rp>（</rp><rt>のう</rt><rp>）</rp></ruby>ある<ruby>鷹<rp>（</rp><rt>たか</rt><rp>）</rp></ruby>は<ruby>爪<rp>（</rp><rt>つめ</rt><rp>）</rp></ruby>を<ruby>隠<rp>（</rp><rt>かく</rt><rp>）</rp></ruby>す。
quote.translation: The wise hawk hides its talons.

martialarts.headline: Martial Artist
martialarts.text:
I love martial arts, especially the Japanese. I practised Shotokan Karate for seven years and then began training **Bujinkan Budo Taijutsu**.

In [Bujinkan](http://wikipedia.org/wiki/Bujinkan) we train **nine different schools**: six **Samurai** and three **Ninja** schools, the oldest of these school is **{% since_year 618 %} years** old and the traditions where given from master to scholar for generations.

These martial arts aren’t sports, but highly efficient fighting systems, proven on the battlefields of ancient Japan.

I run [a website](http://kogakure.de/) on this topic for more than {% since_year 1999 %} years. I collected knowledge about the history, arts, tools, weapons, philosophy and life of the Ninja.

movies.headline: Movie Fan
movies.text: I love movies and TV shows. Most of my space on shelves is occupied by my books, that’s why I don’t own a lot of movies. But I regularly use LoveFilm, Netflix, Watchever and Amazon Prime. I love all genre, especially Action, Comedy, Sci-Fi and Fantasy, but no horror movies. This is my [IMDb profile](http://www.imdb.com/user/ur15936207/) and my [ratings](http://www.imdb.com/user/ur15936207/ratings).

work.headline: Designer & Developer
work.text:
I work as **Front-End Engineer** at **XING** and contributed to **Jobs** (simplified design, new search), **Mobile** ([Touch](https://touch.xing.com/) and iPad hybrid app), **Profile** and the new **Groups**.

I am co-creator of the idea for **XING Projects**, a job platform for freelancer. I worked on this innovation project from the beginning and helped bringing it to the XING BetaLabs program. Later it became a product on the XING platform and was build by a <abbr title="Dedicated Standing Team">DST</abbr>.

I won the award *Best Smart Tools & Services* at the **Prototyping Days 2013**.
